column2: Endava Plc engages in the provision of technology services. The firm using distributed enterprise agile at scale, it collaborates with its clients, integrating with their teams, catalyzing ideation and delivering solutions. The firm serves clients in the payments; financial services; technology, media, and telecom (TMT); consumer products; logistics, and healthcare industries. The firm has its delivery centers in Romania, Moldova, Bulgaria, Serbia, Macedonia, Argentina, Uruguay, Venezuela and Colombia.
